title: Dashboard
description: Do you want a fancy dashboard to show performance evaluation outcomes?
contents:
Here is a project can show individual student score and performance in a specific course with account and password to access.
It was starting from student performance dashboard project

title: Greetings! guys
description:
Welcome to our new blog, Xu's Blog. We hope you enjoy 
reading what we have to say!

title: Welcome to Xu's Blog
description: Exploring data analysis in finance with the R statistical computing environment.
contents:
Greetings, guys! I am Shaoyuan Xu, or you can call me tony, who is a postgraduate dreamed to be a business analysis program developer.
This blog will post all the past and current projects on, and I am looking forward to have a kind knowledge sharing environment with you guys.
Last but not least, recently, I am practicing with R and python. Thus, those program posts consist of those languages.
